segments.advisor_message: So, uh, do you have the name of your dependent?
segments.client_message: Yeah, it’s, uh, Sarah. Just Sarah.

segments.advisor_message: Okay, um, can you tell me when she was born? Like, the date and stuff?
segments.client_message: Oh, right! She was born on 15-05-2010.

segments.advisor_message: Got it. And, uh, how long, uh, will she be a dependent?
segments.client_message: Um, she’ll be a dependent until 20-05-2028, I think.
